description: Try our easy to follow Zoodles with Tomato Pesto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pesto pasta,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Spiralizer,Low sugar,Sesame free,Zucchini,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato
name: Zoodles with Tomato Pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup basil leaves, firmly packed (plus extra, to serve)
3 tbs parmesan, finely grated (save 1 tbs to serve for later)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Arrange tomato cut side-up on tray with garlic. Cook for 20 minutes or until lightly coloured. Cool.

Squeeze soft garlic from the skins into a food processor. Add pine nuts, basil and half the tomato and process until finely chopped. With motor running, gradually add oil and process until a loose paste forms. Transfer to a bowl and stir in parmesan.

Using a spiraliser, cut zucchini into noodles. Blanch in boiling water for 1-2 minutes or until just tender. Drain well. Divide zoodles into bowls. Top with pesto and scatter with extra tomatoes, basil and parmesan. Serve immediately.
